详情: Not just Gothic cool, elegance, style and class but all of this AND cats! Definitely one for the crazy cat ladies, this Lunar Sisters Bag comes from the good folks at Lost Queen. The front features a pair of flock velvet effect kitties on a starlit evening, sitting atop the moon whilst the background has a plethora of the critters on a black background. The main compartment is secured by a full width zip plus there's 2 separate inner zipped compartments for extra security.
